topic.title: Python Hack - Severity: Medium (fake software packages, code execution of benign malware)
topic.body:
Check your Python libraries for fake packages with:

    pip list â€“format=legacy | egrep "^(acqusition|apidev-coop|bzip|crypt|django-server|pwd|setup-tools|telnet|urlib3|urllib)"

Remove and reinstall found packages.

More: http://www.nbu.gov.sk/skcsirt-sa-20170909-pypi/
